_header: This senator that sometime was ruler of Rome

TCD211.Transcription:
Thys senator þat somme tyme was ruler of romeThat caput
                        mundi called is seyde vnto hys soneSone yf þu scholdest leue
                    as long as þu hast doneAnd all much ageyn & halfundell þat
                    sommeAnd half of þat halffe þan wot I wyll þu whereAn
                    .C. wynter olde how long is þat þu where bore
TCD211.Note:
Added to blank page in a sixteenth-century hand; interlinear notes begin
                    above line 3 with ‘xxvj ȝere viij mones’ in answer to the
                    mathematical problem.
